resources.string: Musicify here!\nMusic can be played with MediaPlayer class.\nThis activity showing all track available from user\'s device.
Now Playing\nThis activity is used to show playing music. Music can be played with MediaPlayer class.
Recent\nThis activity is used to show recent played music. Most recent played music will be displayed in the top. \nItems will be displayed as list vertically using RecyclerView

Genre
This activity is displaying list of genres from tracks available from user's devices.
Items will be displayed as grid with 2 columns using RecyclerView.
 Each item display image represent each genre.

Artists
This activity is displaying list of artists from tracks available from user's devices.
Items will be displayed as grid with 2 columns using RecyclerView.
 Each item display image represent each artists.
Playlist\nThis activity is displaying list of playlist made by user.\nItems will be displayed as list vertically using RecyclerView
